1{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
2
3-- | Koshu filter program.
4
5module Koshucode.Baala.Toolkit.Main.KoshuFilter
6  ( koshuFilter
7  ) where
8
9import qualified System.Console.GetOpt                 as G
10import qualified System.IO                             as IO
11import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base                  as B
12import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Data                  as D
13import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Core                  as C
14import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Toolkit.Library.Run   as L
15
16data Option
17    = OptHelp
18    | OptVersion
19    | OptStdin
20      deriving (Show, Eq)
21
22options :: [G.OptDescr Option]
23options =
24    [ G.Option "h" ["help"]     (G.NoArg OptHelp)    "Print help message."
25    , G.Option "V" ["version"]  (G.NoArg OptVersion) "Print version number."
26    , G.Option "i" ["stdin"]    (G.NoArg OptStdin)   "Read from stdin."
27    ]
28
29usage :: String
30usage = G.usageInfo header options
31
32header :: String
33header = unlines
34    [ "DESCRIPTION"
35    , "  Koshu filter program."
36    , ""
37    , "USAGE"
38    , "  koshu FILE.k ...               Process FILE.k ..."
39    , "  koshu -i FILE.k ... < FILE.k   Read from stdin"
40    , ""
41    ] ++ "OPTIONS"
42
43-- | The main function for @koshu-filter@ command.
44koshuFilter :: (D.CContent c) => C.Global c -> (C.Resource c -> IO Int) -> IO Int
45koshuFilter g withRes =
46  do (prog, argv) <- B.progAndArgs
47     proxy        <- L.getProxies
48     today        <- D.today
49     case G.getOpt G.Permute options argv of
50       (opts, paths, [])
51           | has OptHelp     -> B.putSuccess usage
52           | has OptVersion  -> B.putSuccessLn ver
53           | otherwise       -> runFiles g2 withRes src
54           where
55             has   = (`elem` opts)
56             ver   = C.globalSynopsis g ++ " " ++ C.globalVersionText g
57             root  = B.def { C.resGlobal = g2 }
58             src   = B.ioPointList (has OptStdin) [] "" paths
59             g2    = C.globalFill g
60                       { C.globalProgram   = prog
61                       , C.globalArgs      = argv
62                       , C.globalProxy     = proxy
63                       , C.globalTime      = today
64                       , C.globalHook      = root }
65
66       (_, _, errs) -> B.putFailure $ concat errs
67
68runFiles :: (D.CContent c) => C.Global c -> (C.Resource c -> IO Int) -> [B.IOPoint] -> IO Int
69runFiles = hRunFiles B.stdout
70
71hRunFiles
72    :: (D.CContent c)
73    => IO.Handle                 -- ^ Output file handler
74    -> C.Global c                -- ^ Global parameters
75    -> (C.Resource c -> IO Int)  -- ^ Resource handler
76    -> [B.IOPoint]               -- ^ Names of source codes
77    -> IO Int
78hRunFiles h g withRes ns =
79    do (abRes, _) <- C.resRead g ns
80       B.hSetKoshuOutput h
81       case abRes of
82         Left  a   -> C.globalAbort g a
83         Right res -> withRes res
84
